settings.title: LinkedIn App Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your LinkedIn API credentials
settings.instruction_1: Go to LinkedIn Developer Portal and create a new app
settings.instruction_2: Under "Auth" tab, add the redirect URL: https://homey.app/oauth2/callback
settings.instruction_3: Under "Products" tab, request access to "Share on LinkedIn" and "Sign In with LinkedIn" products
settings.instruction_4: Copy the Client ID and Client Secret into the fields above
settings.instruction_5: Save the settings and add a LinkedIn device to continue
